name: Purrinormal Cativity
description:
You play as a cat taking a stroll through a graveyard on a starry fall night. Press 'Z' to jump and 'X' to take swipes at the jack-o-lanterns. Knock down jack-o-lanterns to score points, but don't get caught by a ghost, bat, or owl!

This was our first PICO-8 game and was a lot of fun to put together!
